Articles.Content: I've completely given up on building my Laythe space station because of these fuel tanks falling off before I even get to orbit. They do experience quite a lot of torque, but the normal fuel tanks do just fine... shouldn't the RCS ones stick just as good as the normal ones do to the craft?

What RCS tanks? I have never lost an RCS tank specifically what I can remember. Mods?

Any way stay with in the Green on G-Force that always better for your rockets. No need to go full throttle any way if your going to fast you just waste fuel due to friction in the lower atmosphere.
